creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: brown silk head cloth with gold threads and green stripe (with gold stripes within) near edge of fabric; large middle section is predominately abstract design in gold with some brown showing through; stripes of gold thread on either side of gold section; elaborate maroon tassels with gold braid or wrapped in gold at each end of fabric
title: Head cloth (kasrawaniye)
